CustomField.formula: if (ISPICKVAL( Advocate_at_International_Level__c , "Yes") || ISPICKVAL( Advocate_at_International_Level__c , "Yes") || ISPICKVAL( Advocate_at_International_Level__c , "Yes"), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies all grantees involved in advocacy work on the international/national/local Levels (Formula field based on three Advocacy flag fields set by staff).
CustomField.label: Advocacy Org
